business.industry: all sorts but mostly services - office based, not trades

business_profile.business_description: Web design agency specializing in small business websites

customer_needs.common_questions: How much will it cost? How long will it take? Will I be able to update it myself?

recommendations.name: Interactive Assessment Tool
recommendations.description: An interactive tool that evaluates the user's current situation and provides personalized recommendations.

strengths: Addresses key customer pain points: knowledge, complexity

recommendations.example: A website performance analyzer that evaluates loading speed, mobile optimization, and provides specific improvement recommendations.

recommendations.name: Personalized Plan Generator
recommendations.description: A tool that creates a custom plan or roadmap based on the user's specific situation.

strengths: Addresses key customer pain points: knowledge, complexity

recommendations.example: A marketing plan generator that creates a customized strategy based on business goals, target audience, and budget.

recommendations.name: Problem Diagnostic Tool
recommendations.description: A tool that helps users identify and diagnose specific problems or issues they're facing.

strengths: Addresses key customer pain points: knowledge, complexity

recommendations.example: A home plumbing diagnostic tool that helps identify potential issues based on symptoms and provides recommendations.

lead_magnet.title: all sorts but mostly services - office based, not trades Assessment
lead_magnet.introduction: Welcome to 's assessment tool. This assessment will help us understand your specific needs and provide personalized recommendations.

questions.text: What are your customers' primary needs?
What are your primary business goals?

result_categories.title: Growth Opportunity Identified
result_categories.description: Based on your responses, we have identified key areas for growth and improvement.
recommendations: Focus on improving customer engagement strategies.
Develop a targeted lead generation campaign.
Optimize your sales funnel for better conversions.

call_to_action.heading: Ready to take the next step with ?
call_to_action.description: Get personalized assistance based on your assessment results.

settings.thank_you_message: Thank you for completing this assessment!

installation_guide.title: Installation Guide
installation_guide.description: Follow these steps to add your lead magnet to your website:

options.title: Option 1: Embed directly in your page
options.description: Copy and paste this code into your HTML where you want the lead magnet to appear:

options.title: Option 2: Add as a popup/modal
options.description: Copy and paste this code into your HTML to add a button that opens the lead magnet in a popup:
options.code:
<script src="https://leadmagnet.example.com/js/leadmagnet-embed.js"></script>
<script>
  LeadMagnet.init({
    lead_magnet_id: "lm_1",
    business_id: "bus_1",
    button_text: "Take Assessment",
    button_color: "#3366CC",
    theme: "light"
  });
</script>
<button onclick="LeadMagnet.open()">Take Assessment</button>

options.title: Option 3: WordPress Shortcode
options.description: If you're using WordPress, add this shortcode to any page or post:
options.code: [leadmagnet id="lm_1" business="bus_1" theme="light" button_text="Take Assessment" button_color="#3366CC"]

testing.title: Testing Your Lead Magnet
steps: After installation, visit your page to ensure the lead magnet appears correctly.
You can preview your lead magnet directly at: https://leadmagnet.example.com/public/lm_1?business=bus_1
Complete the lead magnet yourself to test the user experience.
Check your dashboard to confirm that test submissions are being recorded.
